name: 新生报
到
pinyin: Jīntiān shì Xiǎo Méi de dì yī tiān shàng dàxué.
Tā hé māma, bàba, dìdi yīqǐ lái xuéxiào.
Xiǎo Méi kàn dào hěn duō xīn tóngxué.
Tā duì māma shuō: 'Wǒ yǒu diǎnr jǐnzhāng.'
Māma shuō: 'Bié dānxīn, nǐ huì jiāo dào xīn péngyou de.'
Xiǎo Méi qù bàngōngshì bàodào.
Yī gè lǎoshī wèn: 'Nǐ jiào shénme míngzi?'
Xiǎo Méi huídá: 'Wǒ jiào Xiǎo Méi.'
Lǎoshī shuō: 'Huānyíng lái dào wǒmen xuéxiào!'
Xiǎo Méi ná dào le xīn de xuéshēng kǎ hé sùshè yàoshi.
Tā duì jiārén shuō: 'Wǒ zhǔnbèi hǎo le!'
Bàba shuō: 'Jiāyóu! Wǒmen wèi nǐ jiāo'ào.'
english: Today is Xiao Mei's first day of college.
She comes to school with her mom, dad, and younger brother.
Xiao Mei sees many new classmates.
She says to her mom: 'I'm a little nervous.'
Mom says: 'Don't worry, you'll make new friends.'
Xiao Mei goes to the office to register.
A teacher asks: 'What's your name?'
Xiao Mei answers: 'My name is Xiao Mei.'
The teacher says: 'Welcome to our school!'
Xiao Mei receives her new student card and dormitory key.
She says to her family: 'I'm ready!'
Dad says: 'Good luck! We're proud of you.'

name: 第
一堂课
pinyin: Jīntiān shì Xiǎo Méi de dì yī táng kè.
Tā hěn xīngfèn, yě yǒudiǎn jǐnzhāng.
Jiàoshì lǐ yǒu hěn duō tóngxué, dàjiā dōu zài liáotiān.
Xiǎo Méi zhǎodào yīgè zuòwèi zuò xià.
Lǎoshī zǒu jìn jiàoshì, wēixiào zhe shuō: 'Dàjiā hǎo!'
Lǎoshī jièshào zìjǐ: 'Wǒ jiào Lǐ lǎoshī, jīntiān shì wǒmen de dì yī táng kè.'
Xiǎo Méi xīn xiǎng: 'Lǐ lǎoshī kàn qǐlái hěn yǒuhǎo.'
Lǎoshī kāishǐ jiǎng kè, jiǎngjiěle kèchéng nèiróng.
Xiǎo Méi rènzhēn tīng kè, hái zuòle bǐjì.
Xiàkè hòu, Xiǎo Méi hé tóngxuémen yīqǐ tǎolùn.
Tā yù dào yīgè jiào Xiǎo Huá de tóngxué.
Xiǎo Huá shuō: 'Nǐ hǎo! Wǒmen yīqǐ xuéxí ba!'
english: Today is Xiao Mei's first class.
She is very excited but a bit nervous.
There are many classmates in the classroom, and everyone is chatting.
Xiao Mei finds a seat and sits down.
The teacher walks into the classroom and smiles, saying: 'Hello, everyone!'
The teacher introduces himself: 'My name is Teacher Li, today is our first class.'
Xiao Mei thinks: 'Teacher Li seems very friendly.'
The teacher starts the lesson and explains the course content.
Xiao Mei listens carefully and takes notes.
After class, Xiao Mei discusses with her classmates.
She meets a classmate named Xiao Hua.
Xiao Hua says: 'Hello! Let's study together!'

name: 图书馆
奇遇
pinyin: Jīntiān, Xiǎo Méi juédìng qù túshūguǎn.
Tā xiǎng zhǎo yīxiē shū lái bāngzhù xuéxí.
Túshūguǎn lǐ hěn ānjìng, zhǐyǒu fān shū de shēngyīn.
Xiǎo Méi kàn dào hěn duō shūjià, shàngmiàn yǒu xǔduō shū.
Tā kāishǐ zài shūjià jiān zǒu lái zǒu qù.
Túrán, tā tīng dào le yī shēng xiǎo gǒu jiào.
Xiǎo Méi sìchù xúnzhǎo, fāxiàn shì yī zhī xiǎo gǒu.
Xiǎo gǒu kàn qǐlái hěn kě'ài, máo rónɡ rónɡ de.
Xiǎo Méi dūn xià lái shuō: 'Nǐ hǎo, xiǎo gǒu!'
Xiǎo gǒu yáo le yáo wěibā, shìfǒu hěn gāoxìng.
Xiǎo Méi juédìng dài xiǎo gǒu qù zhǎo tā de zhǔrén.
Tā wèn túshūguǎn de gōngzuò rényuán: 'Nǐ kàn dào zhè zhī xiǎo gǒu de zhǔrén ma?'
english: Today, Xiao Mei decides to go to the library.
She wants to find some books to help with her studies.
The library is very quiet, only the sound of pages turning.
Xiao Mei sees many bookshelves filled with books.
She starts walking between the shelves.
Suddenly, she hears a small dog barking.
Xiao Mei looks around and finds a small dog.
The dog looks very cute, fluffy.
Xiao Mei squats down and says: 'Hello, little dog!'
The dog wags its tail, seeming very happy.
Xiao Mei decides to take the dog to find its owner.
She asks the library staff: 'Have you seen the owner of this little dog?'

name: 意外
的
朋友
pinyin: Xiǎo Méi dàizhe xiǎo gǒu zǒu chū túshūguǎn.
Tā xiǎng zhǎodào xiǎo gǒu de zhǔrén.
Zài xiàoyuán lǐ, tā kàn dào yīgè nánhái zhèngzài zhǎo dōngxī.
Xiǎo Méi zǒu guòqù wèn: 'Nǐ zài zhǎo shénme ma?'
Nánhái tái qǐ tóu, kànjiànle xiǎo gǒu.
Tā xiàozhe shuō: 'Zhè zhī xiǎo gǒu shì wǒ de péngyǒu!'
Xiǎo Méi hěn jīngyà, wèn: 'Nǐ shì xiǎo gǒu de zhǔrén ma?'
Nánhái diǎn diǎn tóu, jièshào zìjǐ: 'Wǒ jiào Xiǎo Huá.'
Xiǎo Huá gàosù xiǎo Méi, xiǎo gǒu de míngzì jiào Ào Lì.
Xiǎo Méi hěn gāoxìng, wèn: 'Ào Lì xǐhuān túshūguǎn ma?'
Xiǎo Huá shuō: 'Shì de, tā xǐhuān zài nàlǐ wán.'
Xiǎo Méi hé xiǎo Huá kāishǐ liáotiān, chéngwéi péngyǒu.
english: Xiao Mei walks out of the library with the little dog.
She wants to find the dog's owner.
In the campus, she sees a boy looking for something.
Xiao Mei approaches and asks: 'Are you looking for something?'
The boy looks up and sees the little dog.
He smiles and says: 'This little dog is my friend!'
Xiao Mei is surprised and asks: 'Are you the owner of the little dog?'
The boy nods and introduces himself: 'My name is Xiao Hua.'
Xiao Hua tells Xiao Mei that the dog's name is Oli.
Xiao Mei is happy and asks: 'Does Oli like the library?'
Xiao Hua replies: 'Yes, he likes to play there.'
Xiao Mei and Xiao Hua start chatting and become friends.

name: 找到
小狗
pinyin: Xiǎo Méi hé Xiǎo Huá yīqǐ qù zhǎo Ào Lì.
Tāmen zǒu zài xiàoyuán lǐ, sìchù kàn kàn.
Xiǎo Huá shuō: 'Ào Lì xǐhuān pǎo lái pǎo qù.'
Xiǎo Méi shuō: 'Wǒmen kěyǐ qù cāochǎng zhǎo zhǎo.'
Tāmen lái dào cāochǎng, kàn dào hěnduō xiǎo gǒu.
Xiǎo Huá jiào: 'Ào Lì, Ào Lì!'
Yī zhī xiǎo gǒu pǎo guòlái, dàn bù shì Ào Lì.
Xiǎo Méi shīwàng de shuō: 'Zhè bù shì Ào Lì.'
Tāmen jìxù xúnzhǎo, zǒu dào huāyuán.
Zài huāyuán lǐ, tāmen kàn dào yī zhī xiǎo gǒu zài wán qiú.
Xiǎo Huá wèn: 'Nà shì Ào Lì ma?'
Xiǎo Méi zǐxì kànle kàn, xīnfèn de shuō: 'Shì de, Ào Lì!'
Xiǎo Huá gāoxìng de pǎo guòqù, bǎo qǐ Ào Lì.
english: Xiao Mei and Xiao Hua go together to find Oli.
They walk around the campus, looking everywhere.
Xiao Hua says: 'Oli likes to run around.'
Xiao Mei says: 'We can check the playground.'
They arrive at the playground and see many little dogs.
Xiao Hua calls: 'Oli, Oli!'
A little dog runs over, but it's not Oli.
Xiao Mei says disappointedly: 'This is not Oli.'
They continue searching and walk to the garden.
In the garden, they see a little dog playing with a ball.
Xiao Hua asks: 'Is that Oli?'
Xiao Mei looks closely and excitedly says: 'Yes, it’s Oli!'
Xiao Hua happily runs over and picks up Oli.

name: 宿舍
生活
pinyin: Xiǎo Méi hé Xiǎo Huá zhù zài tóng yī gè sùshè.
Sùshè lǐ yǒu sì gè chuáng, dàjiā dōu hěn yǒuhǎo.
Xiǎo Méi de chuáng zài chuāng biān, fēngjǐng hěn hǎo.
Měitiān wǎnshàng, tāmen yīqǐ zuò zuo yè.
Xiǎo Huá shuō: 'Jīnwǎn wǒmen yīqǐ fùxí ba.'
Xiǎo Méi huídá: 'Hǎo zhǔyì!'
Tāmen yīqǐ fùxí zhōngwén hé shùxué.
Fùxí wán hòu, Xiǎo Huá wèn: 'Nǐ xiǎng chī diǎn shénme?'
Xiǎo Méi shuō: 'Wǒ xiǎng chī pàomiàn.'
Xiǎo Huá cóng bāo lǐ ná chū liǎng bāo pàomiàn.
Tāmen yīqǐ zhǔ pàomiàn, sùshè lǐ chōngmǎnle xiāngwèi.
Chī wán hòu, tāmen yīqǐ liáotiān, fēnxiǎng gùshì.
Xiǎo Méi gǎndào hěn kāixīn, juédé sùshè shēnghuó hěn yǒuqù.
english: Xiao Mei and Xiao Hua live in the same dormitory.
There are four beds in the dorm, and everyone is very friendly.
Xiao Mei's bed is by the window with a nice view.
Every night, they do homework together.
Xiao Hua says: 'Let's review together tonight.'
Xiao Mei replies: 'Good idea!'
They review Chinese and math together.
After reviewing, Xiao Hua asks: 'What do you want to eat?'
Xiao Mei says: 'I want to eat instant noodles.'
Xiao Hua takes out two packs of instant noodles from his bag.
They cook the noodles together, and the dorm smells great.
After eating, they chat and share stories.
Xiao Mei feels very happy and thinks dorm life is fun.

name: 期中考试
pinyin: Qī zhōng kǎoshì kuài dào le, Xiǎo Méi gǎndào yǒuxiē jǐnzhāng.
Tā měitiān dū fùxí zhōngwén hé shùxué.
Xiǎo Huá shuō: 'Bié dānxīn, wǒmen yīqǐ fùxí ba!'
Xiǎo Méi diǎntóu, juédé yǒu péngyǒu yīqǐ hěn hǎo.
Kǎoshì qián yītiān, sùshè lǐ dōu zài mángzhe fùxí.
Xiǎo Méi hé Xiǎo Huá yīqǐ zài túshūguǎn xuéxí.
Tāmen zhǎodàole yīgè ānjìng de dìfāng.
Xiǎo Méi shuō: 'Wǒ duì shùxué yǒudiǎn hàipà.'
Xiǎo Huá ānwèi tā: 'Nǐ huì zuò dé hěn hǎo de!'
Tāmen yīqǐ zuò liànxítí, hùxiāng bāngzhù.
Wǎnshàng, Xiǎo Méi huídào sùshè, fùxí dào hěn wǎn.
Dì èr tiān, tā gǎndào hěn lèi, dàn yě hěn qídài kǎoshì.
english: The midterm exams are coming, and Xiao Mei feels a bit nervous.
She reviews Chinese and math every day.
Xiao Hua says: 'Don't worry, let's review together!'
Xiao Mei nods, feeling good to have a friend.
The day before the exam, everyone in the dorm is busy studying.
Xiao Mei and Xiao Hua study together in the library.
They find a quiet place.
Xiao Mei says: 'I'm a bit scared of math.'
Xiao Hua comforts her: 'You will do great!'
They do practice problems together and help each other.
In the evening, Xiao Mei returns to the dorm and studies late.
The next day, she feels tired but also excited for the exam.

name: 熬夜
后果
pinyin: Qī zhōng kǎoshì hòu, Xiǎo Méi juédé yǒuxiē lèi.
Tā wèile fùxí, áoyè dào hěn wǎn.
Dì èr tiān, tā zǎoshang qǐ bù lái.
Xiǎo Huá lái qiāo mén: 'Xiǎo Méi, kuài qǐchuáng!'
Xiǎo Méi mímíhūhū de huídá: 'Wǒ zài shuì wǔ fēnzhōng.'
Kěshì wǔ fēnzhōng biàn chéngle yīgè xiǎoshí.
Tā zhōngyú qǐchuáng, gǎndào tóu hěn tòng.
Xiǎo Huá shuō: 'Nǐ zuówǎn áoyè le ma?'
Xiǎo Méi diǎntóu, xīnlǐ yǒuxiē hòuhuǐ.
Tā xiǎng: 'Xiàcì wǒ bùnéng zài áoyè le.'
Shàngkè shí, tā hěn nán jízhōng zhùyì lì.
Lǎoshī wèn wèntí shí, tā zǒng shì huídá cuò.
english: After the midterm exams, Xiao Mei feels a bit tired.
She stayed up late to review.
The next day, she can't get up in the morning.
Xiao Hua comes to knock on the door: 'Xiao Mei, wake up!'
Xiao Mei sleepily replies: 'I'll sleep for five more minutes.'
But five minutes turns into an hour.
She finally gets up and feels a headache.
Xiao Hua says: 'Did you stay up late last night?'
Xiao Mei nods, feeling a bit regretful.
She thinks: 'Next time, I can't stay up late again.'
In class, she finds it hard to concentrate.
When the teacher asks questions, she always answers incorrectly.

name: 小狗
生病
pinyin: Yītiān, Ào Lì túrán bù chī dōngxī le.
Xiǎo Méi hěn dānxīn, wèn māmā: 'Ào Lì zěnme le?'
Māmā shuō: 'Kěnéng tā shēngbìng le, wǒmen yào dài tā qù kàn yīshēng.'
Xiǎo Méi mǎshàng dàizhe Ào Lì qù chǒngwù yīyuàn.
Zài yīyuàn, yīshēng jiǎnchá le Ào Lì.
Yīshēng shuō: 'Ào Lì yǒudiǎn gǎnmào, xūyào xiūxí.'
Xiǎo Méi tīngle, xīnlǐ hěn nánguò.
Tā qīngqīng de fǔmō Ào Lì, gàosù tā: 'Nǐ huì hǎo de.'
Yīshēng gěi Ào Lì kāile yīxiē yào.
Xiǎo Méi huídào jiā, gěi Ào Lì wèi yào.
Tā měitiān dōu péizhe Ào Lì, gěi tā jiǎng gùshì.
english: One day, Oli suddenly stopped eating.
Xiao Mei was very worried and asked her mom: 'What's wrong with Oli?'
Her mom said: 'Maybe it is sick; we need to take it to the doctor.'
Xiao Mei immediately took Oli to the pet hospital.
At the hospital, the doctor examined Oli.
The doctor said: 'Oli has a slight cold and needs rest.'
Xiao Mei felt very sad upon hearing this.
She gently patted Oli and told it: 'You will get better.'
The doctor prescribed some medicine for Oli.
Xiao Mei returned home and gave Oli the medicine.
Every day, she stayed with Oli and told it stories.

name: 校园
活动
pinyin: Yītiān, xuéxiào jǔxíngle yī chǎng xiàoyuán huódòng.
Xiǎo Méi hé tā de péngyǒumen dōu hěn xīngfèn.
Tāmen juédìng yīqǐ cānjiā zhège huódòng.
Huódòng yǒu hěnduō yǒuqù de xiàngmù, bǐrú yóuxì hé biǎoyǎn.
Xiǎo Méi hé péngyǒumen shǒuxiān cānjiāle bá hé bǐsài.
Bǐsài zhōng, Xiǎo Méi dà hǎn: 'Jiāyóu! Wǒmen yīdìng néng yíng!'
Zuìhòu, tāmen yíngdéle bǐsài, dàjiā dōu hěn kāixīn.
Jiēxiàlái, tāmen guānzhào le xuéxiào de wǔdǎo biǎoyǎn.
Biǎoyǎn fēicháng jīngcǎi, Xiǎo Méi pāi shǒu jiàohǎo.
Huódòng jiéshù shí, xuéxiào wèi měi gè cān yǔ zhě fāle xiǎo lǐwù.
Xiǎo Méi shōudàole yīgè kě'ài de yàoshi liàn, tā hěn xǐhuān.
english: One day, the school held a campus event.
Xiao Mei and her friends were very excited.
They decided to participate in the event together.
There were many interesting activities, such as games and performances.
Xiao Mei and her friends first joined the tug-of-war competition.
During the competition, Xiao Mei shouted: 'Go! We can definitely win!'
In the end, they won the competition, and everyone was very happy.
Next, they watched the school's dance performance.
The performance was very wonderful, and Xiao Mei clapped and cheered.
At the end of the event, the school gave a small gift to each participant.
Xiao Mei received a cute keychain, and she liked it very much.

name: 期末
准备
pinyin: Qīmò kǎoshì kuài dào le, Xiǎo Méi kāishǐ zhǔnbèi.
Tā zài sùshè lǐ fùxí kèběn, zhuōzi shàng yǒu hěnduō shū.
Xiǎo Méi de péngyǒumen yě zài yīqǐ fùxí, dàjiā hùxiāng bāngzhù.
Xiǎo Méi shuō: 'Wǒmen yào yīqǐ jiāyóu, bùnéng fàngqì!'
Tāmen zhìdìngle xuéxí jìhuà, fēnpèi le měi gè kēmù de shíjiān.
Wǎnshàng, Xiǎo Méi hé péngyǒumen yīqǐ tǎolùn nán tí.
Ào lì zài pángbiān ānjìng de shuìjiào, sìhū yě zài wèi Xiǎo Méi jiāyóu.
Fùxí de shíhòu, Xiǎo Méi hēle hěnduō shuǐ, bǎochí qīngxǐng.
Tāmen hái zhǔnbèile yīxiē xiǎo língshí, bǔchōng néngliàng.
Zuìhòu, Xiǎo Méi gǎndào yǒudiǎn jǐnzhāng, dàn tā xiāngxìn zìjǐ néng xíng.
english: Final exams are approaching, and Xiao Mei starts preparing.
She reviews her textbooks in the dorm, with many books on the table.
Xiao Mei's friends are also studying together, helping each other.
Xiao Mei says: 'We need to cheer each other on and not give up!'
They create a study plan and allocate time for each subject.
In the evening, Xiao Mei and her friends discuss difficult problems.
Aoli sleeps quietly beside them, as if cheering for Xiao Mei.
While studying, Xiao Mei drinks a lot of water to stay alert.
They also prepare some snacks to recharge their energy.
In the end, Xiao Mei feels a bit nervous, but she believes she can do it.

name: 考试
日
pinyin: Kǎoshì rì zhōngyú láile, Xiǎo Méi zǎo zǎo qǐchuáng.
Tā chuān shàng le gānjìng de yīfú, xīnlǐ yǒudiǎn jǐnzhāng.
Zài cāntīng lǐ, Xiǎo Méi chīle yī wǎn zhōu, nǔlì ràng zìjǐ fàngsōng.
Tā de péngyǒumen yě zài yīqǐ, dàjiā hùxiāng gǔlì.
Xiǎo Méi shuō: 'Jīntiān yīdìng yào jiāyóu!'
Kǎoshì kāishǐ qián, tā ná chū wénjù, zǐxì jiǎnchá.
Zài kǎochǎng shàng, Xiǎo Méi rènzhēn dāti, jǐnliàng bù fēn xīn.
Ào lì zài sùshè lǐ děngzhe Xiǎo Méi huílái, gěi tā jiāyóu.
Kǎoshì jiéshù hòu, Xiǎo Méi gǎndào sōngle yī kǒu qì.
Tā hé péngyǒumen yīqǐ zǒuchū kǎochǎng, kāixīn de tǎolùn tímù.
english: Exam day has finally arrived, and Xiao Mei gets up early.
She puts on clean clothes and feels a bit nervous.
In the cafeteria, Xiao Mei eats a bowl of porridge, trying to relax.
Her friends are also together, encouraging each other.
Xiao Mei says: 'We must do our best today!'
Before the exam starts, she takes out her stationery and checks carefully.
In the exam room, Xiao Mei answers questions seriously, trying not to get distracted.
Aoli is waiting in the dorm for Xiao Mei to come back, cheering for her.
After the exam ends, Xiao Mei feels a sigh of relief.
She and her friends walk out of the exam room, happily discussing the questions.

name: 等待
成绩
pinyin: Kǎoshì jiéshù hòu, Xiǎo Méi gǎndào yǒuxiē jǐnzhāng.
Tā hé péngyǒumen yīqǐ zài sùshè lǐ děngdài chéngjī.
Xiǎo Méi shuō: 'Wǒ xīwàng wǒ de chéngjī néng hěn hǎo.'
Tā de péngyǒumen yě zài tǎolùn, dàjiā dōu yǒuxiē bù'ān.
Ào lì zài pángbiān, shìhū néng gǎnshòudào Xiǎo Méi de xīnqíng.
Xiǎo Méi juédìng qù túshūguǎn dúshū, fēnsàn zìjǐ de zhùyìlì.
Zài túshūguǎn lǐ, tā kàn dào hěnduō tóngxué yě zài fùxí.
Xiǎo Méi nǔlì ràng zìjǐ zhuānjù, dàn xīnlǐ háishi yǒudiǎn jiāolǜ.
Tā xiǎngqǐle māmā de gǔlì, xīnlǐ shāowéi tàshíle yīxiē.
Zhōngyú, chéngjī gōngbù de rìzi dào le, Xiǎo Méi de xīntiào jiāzú.
english: After the exam, Xiao Mei feels a bit nervous.
She and her friends are waiting for the results in the dorm.
Xiao Mei says: 'I hope my results will be good.'
Her friends are also discussing, and everyone feels a bit uneasy.
Aoli is nearby, seemingly sensing Xiao Mei's mood.
Xiao Mei decides to go to the library to study and distract herself.
In the library, she sees many classmates also reviewing.

pinyin: Chéngjī chūláile, Xiǎo Méi de chéngjī bǐ tā xiǎngxiàng de yào hǎo.
Tā hé péngyǒumen yīqǐ qìngzhù, dàjiā dōu hěn kāixīn.
Xiǎo Méi shuō: 'Wǒ zhēn de hěn nǔlì, gǎnxiè dàjiā de zhīchí!'
Ào lì zài pángbiān pǎo lái pǎo qù, shìhū yě zài qìngzhù.
Tāmen juédìng yīqǐ qù chī bīngqílín, qìngzhù zhège hǎo jiéguǒ.
Zài bīngqílín diàn lǐ, péngyǒumen fēnxiǎngzhe zìjǐ de gùshì hé gǎnshòu.
Xiǎo Méi huíxiǎng qǐ zhè xuéqī de diǎndī, juédé shōuhuò hěn dà.
Tā gǎnxiè māmā hé bàba de gǔlì, ràng tā yǒu yǒngqì miànduì tiǎozhàn.
Tā yě hěn gāoxìng néng zhǎodào Ào lì zhèyàng de xiǎo huǒbàn.
Zhè xuéqī de jīnglì ràng tā gèngjiā zhēnxī shēnbiān de rén hé shì.
english: The results came out, and Xiao Mei's grades were better than she expected.
She and her friends celebrate together, and everyone is very happy.
Xiao Mei says: 'I really worked hard, thank you all for your support!'
Aoli runs around nearby, seeming to celebrate as well.
They decide to go eat ice cream together to celebrate this good result.
In the ice cream shop, friends share their stories and feelings.
Xiao Mei reflects on the semester and feels she has gained a lot.
She thanks her mom and dad for their encouragement, which gave her the courage to face challenges.
She is also very happy to have found a little friend like Aoli.
The experiences of this semester make her cherish the people and things around her even more.
